quotes: We will make America strong again. We will make America proud again. We will make America safe again. And we will make America great again.
Everything in life is luck.
Sometimes by losing a battle you find a new way to win the war.
No dream is too big. No challenge is too great. Nothing we want for our future is beyond our reach.
I've always said, 'If you need Viagra, you're probably with the wrong girl.'
What separates the winners from the losers is how a person reacts to each new twist of fate.
Without passion you don't have energy, without energy you have nothing.
As long as you're going to be thinking anyway, think big.
I like thinking big. If you're going to be thinking anything, you might as well think big.
When somebody challenges you, fight back. Be brutal, be tough.
You have to think anyway, so why not think big?
Experience taught me a few things. One is to listen to your gut, no matter how good something sounds on paper.
People love me. And you know what, I have been very successful. Everybody loves me.
Together, we will make America strong again. We will make wealthy again. We will make America proud again. We will make America safe again. And yes, together, we will make America great again.
Anyone who thinks my story is anywhere near over is sadly mistaken.
I've always won, and I'm going to continue to win. And that's the way it is.
Sometimes your best investments are the ones you don't make.
Part of being a winner is knowing when enough is enough.
I will fight for you with every breath in my body - and I will never, ever let you down.
We must speak our minds openly, debate our disagreements honestly, but always pursue solidarity.
I don't like losers.
I try to learn from the past, but I plan for the future by focusing exclusively on the present. That's where the fun is.
Money was never a big motivation for me, except as a way to keep score. The real excitement is playing the game.
